description:
Jay is a blast from my past. I worked with Jay about 5 years ago.
I had heard from the grapevine he was still in fantastic shape, and had matured into and even hotter dude.
You can tell he still hits the gym pretty hard, but now has a more mature look and vibe to him.
The boy has got some big balls, and if you love feet, you are in for a treat. Typical of guys who seem to beat off in the shower, he does best when he flexes his legs and curls his toes- his cumshot is an awesome experience as every muscle and vein Hulks out!
He also seems to have relaxed his limits, so I might mix him in and see just how far he will take it!
title: Jay - Solo
